words.translation: Ha Meem

translations.15: Ḥâ-Mĩm

words.translation: By the Book|the clear

translations.15: By the clear Book

words.translation: Indeed We|revealed it|in|a Night|Blessed|Indeed We|[We] are|(ever) warning

translations.1: Innaaa anzalnaahu fee lailatim mubaarakah; innaa kunnaa munzireen
translations.15: Indeed, We sent it down on a blessed night, for We always warn ˹against evil˺

words.translation: Therein|is made distinct|every|affair|wise

translations.15: On that night every matter of wisdom is ordained

words.translation: A command|from|Us|Indeed We|[We] are|(ever) sending

translations.15: by a command from Us, for We have always sent ˹messengers˺

words.translation: As Mercy|from|your Lord|Indeed He|[He]|(is) the All-Hearer|the All-Knower

translations.1: Rahmatam mir rabbik; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
translations.15: as a mercy from your Lord. He ˹alone˺ is truly the All-Hearing, All-Knowing—

words.translation: Lord|(of) the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between both of them|if|you|would be certain

translations.1: Rabbis samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa; in kuntum mooqineen
translations.15: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, if only you had sure faith

words.translation: (There is) no|god|except|Him|He gives life|and causes death|your Lord|and (the) Lord|(of) your fathers|the former

translations.1: Laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa yuhyee Wa-yumeetu Rabbukum Wa-Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen
translations.15: There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. He ˹alone˺ gives life and causes death. ˹He is˺ your Lord, and the Lord of your forefathers

words.translation: Nay|they|(are) in|doubt|playing

translations.15: In fact, they are in doubt, amusing themselves

words.translation: Then watch|(for the) Day|(when) will bring|the sky|smoke|visible

translations.1: Fartaqib Yawma ta'tis samaaa'u bi-dukhaanin mubeen
translations.15: Wait then ˹O Prophet˺ for the day ˹when˺ the sky will be veiled in haze, clearly visible

words.translation: Enveloping|the people|This|(will be) a punishment|painful

translations.15: overwhelming the people. ˹They will cry,˺ “This is a painful torment

words.translation: Our Lord!|Remove|from us|the punishment|indeed we|(are) believers

translations.15: Our Lord! Remove ˹this˺ torment from us, ˹and˺ we will certainly believe.”

words.translation: How can|(there be) for them|the reminder|when verily|had come to them|a Messenger|clear

translations.1: Annaa lahumuz zikraa Wa-qad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum mubeen
translations.15: How can they be reminded when a messenger has already come to them, making things clear

words.translation: Then|they turned away|from him|and said|One taught|a mad man

translations.15: then they turned away from him, saying, “A madman, taught by others!”

words.translation: Indeed We|(will) remove|the punishment|a little|indeed you|(will) return

translations.15: Indeed, We will remove ˹that˺ torment for a while, and you ˹Meccans˺ will return ˹to disbelief˺

words.translation: (The) Day|We will seize|(with) the seizure|the greatest|indeed We|(will) take retribution

translations.1: Yawma nabtishul batsha-tal kubraa innaa muntaqimoon
translations.15: ˹Then˺ on the Day We will deal ˹you˺ the fiercest blow, We will surely inflict punishment

words.translation: And certainly|We tried|before them|(the) people|(of) Firaun|and came to them|a Messenger|noble

translations.1: Wa-laqad fatannaa qablahum qawma Fir'awna Wa-jaaa'ahum Rasoolun kareem
translations.15: Indeed, before them We tested Pharaoh’s people: a noble messenger came to them

words.translation: That|Deliver|to me|(the) servants|(of) Allah|Indeed I am|to you|a Messenger|trustworthy

translations.1: An addooo ilaiya 'ibaadal laahi innee lakum Rasoolun ameen
translations.15: ˹proclaiming,˺ “Hand over the servants of Allah to me. I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you

words.translation: And that|(do) not|exalt yourselves|against|Allah|Indeed I|[I] have come to you|with an authority|clear

translations.1: Wa-al laa ta'loo 'alal laahi innee aateekum bisultaanim mubeen
translations.15: And do not be arrogant with Allah. I have certainly come to you with a compelling proof

words.translation: And indeed I|[I] seek refuge|with my Lord|and your Lord|lest|you stone me

translations.15: And indeed, I seek refuge with my Lord and your Lord so you do not stone me ˹to death˺

words.translation: And if|not|you believe|me|then leave me alone

translations.15: ˹But˺ if you do not believe me, then let me be.”

words.translation: So he called|his Lord|That|these|(are) a people|criminals

translations.1: Fada'aa rabbahooo anna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmum mujrimoon
translations.15: Ultimately, he cried out to his Lord, “These are a wicked people!”

words.translation: Then Set out|with My slaves|(by) night|Indeed you|(will be) followed

translations.15: ˹Allah responded,˺ “Leave with My servants at night, for you will surely be pursued

words.translation: And leave|the sea|at rest|Indeed they|(are) an army|(to be) drowned

translations.1: Watrukil bahra rahwan innahum jundum mughraqoon
translations.15: And leave the sea parted, for they are certainly an army bound to drown.”

words.translation: How many|(did) they leave|of|gardens|and springs

translations.15: ˹Imagine˺ how many gardens and springs the tyrants left behind

words.translation: And cornfields|and places|noble

translations.15: as well as ˹various˺ crops and splendid residences

words.translation: And pleasant things|they used (to)|therein|take delight!

translations.15: and luxuries which they fully enjoyed

words.translation: Thus|And We made it (an) inherit(ance)|(for) a people|another

translations.15: So it was. And We awarded it ˹all˺ to another people

words.translation: And not|wept|for them|the heaven|and the earth|and not|they were|given respite

translations.1: Famaa bakat 'alaihimus samaaa'u wal-ardu Wa-maa kaanoo munzareen
translations.15: Neither heaven nor earth wept over them, nor was their fate delayed

words.translation: And certainly|We saved|(the) Children of Israel|(the) Children of Israel|from|the punishment|the humiliating

translations.1: Wa-laqad najjainaa Baneee Israaa'eela minal 'azaabil muheen
translations.15: And We certainly delivered the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment

words.translation: From|Firaun|Indeed he|was|arrogant|among|the transgressors

translations.1: Min Fir'awn; innahoo kaana 'aaliyam minal musrifeen
translations.15: of Pharaoh. He was truly a tyrant, a transgressor

words.translation: And certainly|We chose them|by|knowledge|over|the worlds

translations.15: And indeed, We chose the Israelites knowingly above the others

words.translation: And We gave them|of|the Signs|that|in it|(was) a trial|clear

translations.1: Wa-aatainaahum minal aayaati maa feehi balaaa'um mubeen
translations.15: And We showed them signs in which there was a clear test

words.translation: Indeed|these|surely they say

translations.15: Indeed, these ˹Meccans˺ say

words.translation: Not|it|(is) but|our death|the first|and not|we|(will be) raised again

translations.1: In hiya illaa mawtatunal oolaa Wa-maa nahnu bimun-shareen
translations.15: “There is nothing beyond our first death, and we will never be resurrected

words.translation: Then bring|our forefathers|if|you are|truthful

translations.15: Bring ˹back˺ our forefathers, if what you say is true.”

words.translation: Are they|better|or|(the) people|(of) Tubba|and those|before them|before them|We destroyed them|indeed, they|were|criminals

translations.1: Ahum khayrun am qawmu Tubba'inw wallazeena min qablihim; ahlaknaahum innahum kaanoo mujrimeen
translations.15: Are they superior to the people of Tubba’ and those before them? We destroyed them ˹all˺, ˹for˺ they were truly wicked

words.translation: And not|We created|the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between them|(in) play

translations.1: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa baina-humaa laa'ibeen
translations.15: We did not create the heavens and the earth and everything in between for sport

words.translation: Not|We created both of them|but|in [the] truth|but|most of them|(do) not|know

translations.1: Maa khalaqnaahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
translations.15: We only created them for a purpose, but most of these ˹pagans˺ do not know

words.translation: Indeed|(the) Day of Judgment|(the) Day of Judgment|(is) an appointed term for them|all

translations.15: Surely the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision is the time appointed for all—

words.translation: (The) Day|not|will avail|a relation|for|a relation|anything|and not|they|will be helped

translations.1: Yawma laa yughnee mawlan 'am mawlan shai'anw Wa-laa hum yunsaroon
translations.15: the Day no kith or kin will be of benefit to another whatsoever, nor will they be helped

words.translation: Except|(on) whom|Allah has mercy|Allah has mercy|Indeed, He|[He]|(is) the All-Mighty|the Most Merciful

translations.1: Illaa mar rahimal laah' innahoo huwal 'azeezur raheem
translations.15: except those shown mercy by Allah. He is truly the Almighty, Most Merciful

words.translation: Indeed|(the) tree|(of) Zaqqum

translations.15: Surely ˹the fruit of˺ the tree of Zaqqûm

words.translation: (Will be) food|(of) the sinner(s)

translations.15: will be the food of the evildoer

words.translation: Like the murky oil|it will boil|in|the bellies

translations.15: Like molten metal, it will boil in the bellies

words.translation: Like boiling|(of) scalding water

translations.15: like the boiling of hot water

words.translation: Seize him|and drag him|into|(the) midst|(of) the Hellfire

translations.15: ˹It will be said,˺ “Seize them and drag them into the depths of the Hellfire

words.translation: Then|pour|over|his head|of|(the) punishment|(of) the scalding water

translations.1: Summa subboo fawqa ra'sihee min 'azaabil hameem
translations.15: Then pour over their heads the torment of boiling water.”

words.translation: Taste!|Indeed you|[you] (were)|the mighty|the noble

translations.15: ˹The wicked will be told,˺ “Taste this. You mighty, noble one

words.translation: Indeed|this|(is) what|you used (to)|[about it]|doubt

translations.1: Inna haazaa maa kuntum bihee tamtaroon
translations.15: This is truly what you ˹all˺ used to doubt.”

words.translation: Indeed|the righteous|(will be) in|a place|secure

translations.15: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place

words.translation: In|gardens|and springs

translations.15: amid Gardens and springs

words.translation: Wearing garments|of|fine silk|and heavy silk|facing each other

translations.15: dressed in fine silk and rich brocade, facing one another

words.translation: Thus|And We will marry them|(to) companions with beautiful eyes|(to) companions with beautiful eyes

translations.15: So it will be. And We will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes

words.translation: They will call|therein|for every kind|(of) fruit|secure

translations.15: There they will call for every fruit in serenity

words.translation: Not|they will taste|therein|the death|except|the death|the first|And He will protect them|(from the) punishment|(of) the Hellfire

translations.1: Laa yazooqoona feehal mawtaa illal mawtatal oolaa Wa-waqaahum 'azaabal jaheem
translations.15: There they will never taste death, beyond the first death. And He will protect them from the punishment of the Hellfire—

words.translation: A Bounty|from|your Lord|That|it|(will be) the success|the great

translations.1: Fadlam mir rabbik; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem
translations.15: as ˹an act of˺ grace from your Lord. That is ˹truly˺ the ultimate triumph

words.translation: Indeed|We have made it easy|in your tongue|so that they may|take heed

translations.15: Indeed, We have made this ˹Quran˺ easy in your own language ˹O Prophet˺ so perhaps they will be mindful

words.translation: So watch|indeed they|(too are) watching

translations.15: Wait then! They too are certainly waiting
